snippet: A government spokesman says Boko Haram fighters kidnapped the wife of Cameroon's vice prime minister in an attack that also resulted in multiple deaths....

headline.print_headline: Boko Haram Kidnaps Top Official's Wife in Cameroon
headline.main: Boko Haram Kidnaps Top Official's Wife in Cameroon

lead_paragraph: A government spokesman says Boko Haram fighters kidnapped the wife of Cameroon's vice prime minister in an attack that also resulted in multiple deaths.
